known_issues: User reporting access/permission issue after deployment

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the admin authorization system so that the Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-s' is properly recognized as an admin and granted access to the admin panel in production
Ensure admin Principal IDs persist correctly across canister upgrades so that authorized admins do not lose access after deployment

projectName: Fix admin access authorization issue in production
